product.name: Novilla Queen Mattress
product.category: Memory Foam Mattress (Type: Medium Firm; Size: Queen 12 Inch)
product.description:
CertiPUR-US CERTIFIED ENSURES HEALTHY SLEEP: The Novilla queen mattress is designed with a 3-layer foam system for better support and comfort. The comfort foam adsorbs moisture and helps keep the sleep surface cool, providing you with a fresh and clean sleeping environment.

COOL & COMFORTABLE SLEEP: The queen memory foam mattress cover is made of high-quality knitted fabrics, providing superior comfort and durability. Knitted fabrics excel in great breathability and are soft-to-touch with enhanced air circulation for a cooler night's sleep.

PRESSURE RELIEF & EDGE SUPPORT: The memory foam mattress offers a medium firmness sleep experience. Underneath the mattress cover lies a layer of comfort foam that conforms closely to the body's shape and relieves pain at pressure points. The supportive base generates enough pushback to provide excellent support to the body. The edge support on both sides of the mattress is reinforced to prevent slipping when sitting or sleeping near the edge.

REMOVABLE WASHABLE MATTRESS COVER: Equipped with a high-quality zipper at the bottom of the mattress for easy removal of the cover. You can simply toss it into the washing machine for a quick and easy clean, protecting your mattress from stains and keeping the sleeping surface hygienic.

WORRY-FREE PURCHASE: The queen mattresses come with a no-risk 100-night trial and a 10-year limited warranty. The mattress queen is compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box, making it convenient for you to set up by yourself. It's compatible with most bed bases and frames. For a better sleeping experience, please allow at least 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand.

reviews.title: You get what you pay for!

reviews.title: Really recommend buying 1 for you too, not just for the Teens' room
reviews.review: We just moved. We needed something way better than blow up beds, but something way more affordable than mattresses.... this bed solves that problem!  We thought this was temporary fix but we are keeping them, just need to get platforms to place them on, not sure about that since they all seem to say the platform underneath isn't reliable.  But if you have the blow up bed and the teens all have this bed.... welp, they're teens, they can sleep on the blow mattress until YOUR own KING memory foam is delivered! LOL True story! Love this memory foam, never used it before, my whole body feels great, I think I was actually smiling in my sleep! We let the kids set it up its so easy!

reviews.title: Meets my expectations
reviews.review: This is my third memory foam mattress and bought this brand for the first time, compared to other 2 I have this mattress meets my expectations, it's firm after I let it set for 2 days, comfort and support at the same time, I have lower back pain, so I can't stand mattress that doesn't have firm support, otherwise I would wake up with back pain, this mattress is soft on the very top layer for comfort, and firm under the top later, perfect for support and comfort balance. I saw there was a label says if it smell it's not harmful, so I tried to smell it but couldn't smell anything, I let it set in the basement for 2 days just to be safe anyway. It was easy to open, I did it myself with no help at all, it was wrapped pretty well with a long plastic cover. It feels good quality to touch, the price is pretty good compared to my $500 firm spring mattress that is 9 years old (nowadays good spring mattress can easily go 4 digits), this one is about the same price level with my the other 2 memory foam mattresses, only a bit better feel to touch in quality. All in all, it is a decent medium firm memory foam mattress for its affordable price.

reviews.title: Read the reviews!!

reviews.title: NO more PAIN!
reviews.review: We absolutely LOVE this mattress.  It is firm enough to support our bodies, but also allows for our bodies to settle into in, with a total body alignment. Thank you So much Novilla, for providing us a fabulous mattress, with a price that was amazing!  It definately needs a proper bed frame for the mattress to give all it has to offer…
